entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Wasm] Very large methods cause interpreter tiering to fail and leak unmanaged memory #93192
    9.0.0
  • XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time both output date & time when using the empty string (default) format #93189
  • [mono][aot] Precompiling failed for System.Private.CoreLib.dll with exit code 134 #93188
    9.0.0
  • Test failure _AdvSimd_Arm64_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm._AdvSimd.Arm64.Program.LoadVector128x3UShort() #93184

Closed

  • release/8.0 branch doesn't build with .NET 8 RC1 #93011
    8.0.0
  • Source generator for options validation leads to trimming warnings/errors in AOT #92327
    8.0.0
  • Environment.GetfolderPath( Environment.SpecialFolder.Personal ) not returning FolderPath in .net 8.0 rc1 #93094

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93193
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve literal-after-loop regex optimization #93190
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some issues for CoreRoot test cases: #93187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the `System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.` in Methodical_r2.sh-deep_array_nz_r.dll when DOTNET_GCStress=4. #93186
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 117.0.5938.149, windows: 118.0.5993.54 #93183
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93088
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • crashinfo.cpp/crashinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #91968
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update comment with min OS version locations to update #93180
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add standalonegc-disabled.lib to reproNative.vcxproj #93185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update JIT debug helpers #93086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new nativeaot files to the platform manifest #93181
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure-installer

Updated

  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix clsHnd in impImportCall #93176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up calling interface methods #93100
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Remove coree/mixed-mode support #93153
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-08

Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Visual Studio reports warnings in auto-generated tagged files #70280

Updated

  • C#: The compiler should be consistent about issuing error CS1612 when modifying readonly rvalue struct #45284
    Backlog
  • Improve docs for testing source generators #58945
    Backlog
  • Only suggestions for types are shown after typing `.` following `is SomeType` pattern #70226

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable recommender for `scoped` keyword #70290
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Recommend `void` keyword in `using unsafe` directives #70289
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51212
  • Hot Reload Support For Blazor #51211
  • Add endpoint name / action label to OpenTelemetry metrics #51209
  • There is an error "Exception while reading WASM runtime capabilities: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined " when dotnet watch Blazor WASM app after installing .NET 8.0-rtm at first time #51208
  • Perf improvement: json #51207

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix handling of default values in RDG #51193
    area-minimal
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS: ShellFlyoutRenderer setOverrideUserInterfaceStyle "unrecognized selector sent to instance" exception #17892

Closed

  • Android Crashing: "Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to draw too large(109224768bytes) bitmap.'" Runs perfect on iOS/Windows. Any ideas why? #17862

PullRequests

Updated

  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
